boardgame.name: The Scepter of Zavandor
Das Zepter von Zavandor
boardgame.description: The Scepter of Zavandor is about magic and power. Players represent young magicians who have gained possession of old magic knowledge, and with it they attempt to achieve the powerful position of archmage, symbolized by the Scepter of Zavandor._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To increase their power and influence, the young magicians enchant jewels and seek out knowledge. An auction mechanism also allows them to acquire artifacts and sentinels. Victory points are earned through active gems, artifacts, sentinels, and knowledge._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game's rulebook includes a note thanking James Hlavaty for permission to copy the game mechanics from Outpost._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2005 Japan Boardgame Prize Best Advanced Game Nominee

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: never played +++++ plays LIKE OUTPOST , the very rare game from timjim +++++ german version and german rules and game parts, but i am almost sure, that you can find (or will find in the near future ) a rules translation somewhere on the net +++++ will be shipped with insurance only +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-countries : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ if you want to use paypal, please ask before, if any paypal commission has to be included in the transaction (for non-euro countries for example, in most cases this could be about 4 to 4,5%) +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), pleask at for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance

This is a complex game for me to rate on condition. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the German edition. The artifact cards and the shared central knowledge board have been pasted up meticulously. The cards have edge wear because it was played a fair bit when I first had it. The box has shelf wear. Essentially, this is a player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s copy of the game. The individual player boards are still in German, but trust me, if pasting them up was useful I would have done it, but it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s really not. Payment accepted via Paypal, Cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Check or Money Order. I ship to the US using USPS flat rate boxes for 10, elsewhere at cost, but I am forced to use airmail because the USPS does not own boats anymore. Airmail is expensive.

The rate structure for those boxes is as follows: Shipping for games that will fit within a 8.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; X 5.25_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; X 1.5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; box costs $4.95. Due to continuing storage problems, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m regularly selling (least-played) games from my personal collection. I did like all the games I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling , but with 200+ board and card games there are always other (comparable) contenders that just speak to me more. And besides, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m a real collector, always trying to perfect my collection with games I only like best (at that moment in time). The low pricing, therefore, is simple (if you were wondering): I just want to make other people happy for a few bucks/euros. Enabling me to purchase a new game every four or five orders. This game - The Scepter of Zavandor - has been played quite a lot (15 - 20 times, I think). Box has a few scuff marks (hence the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; condition) and all the pieces and boards are still in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;very good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; condition. I do take good care of my games :) ... Shipping from The Netherlands, Utrecht (PostNL or Kiala). So, before placing your order, please ask me for a shipping and packaging cost estimate first! Thank you for visiting and do check out the other games I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling: https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/gideongrim ...
